cognitive_task.description: This service provides a convenient and efficient way to send multimodal prompts to Antropic Claude models through the Amazon Bedrock platform. It supports both generic text-based prompts as well as prompts that include multiple images, allowing for a more comprehensive and engaging interaction with the AI models.
